page.title: 07Ecology-Ide Hill
page.content: {Ecology} The booklet by the members of the Ide Hill Society details seven walks in this area stretching as far as Bough Beech reservoir. The walks all start and finish at the Village Green. The distances range from 1 miles to over 5 miles and cover a wide range of terrain. There are spectacular views to the North Downs and over the Weald of Kent & Sussex. Ide Hill was one of the first properties acquired by the National Trust with the object of preserving this beauty spot for posterity.
